name: Bok Choy: Tale of the Hidden Tower
name_original: Bok Choy: Tale of the Hidden Tower
description:
Bok Choy: Tale of the Hidden Tower

Bok Choy: Tale of the Hidden Tower is a platform, puzzle game about nature having reclaimed her territory from a man-made tower of stone; where a lone Bok Choy un-grounds himself in an attempt to reach the inside of the tower and discover its secrets within. His climb seems impossible, but during his climb he encounters many seemingly hidden objects that aid his ascent: it shows that even in the seemingly most inhospitable medium such as rock, life can blossom from the smallest invisible crack and opportunity is everywhere for those who care to take a closer look!

Creators: Sharayar, Joshua, Jorge, Tony, Nahee Jamie

Assets: Artwork done by Joshua and Jamie. Music by 

BGM: Modified version of Awaken by Marshall Usinger
SoundFX provided by Storyblocks.com (formerly Audioblocks
